name: Lion Hearted
description:
NOTE: THIS GAME IS UNDER DEVELOPMENT SO NOT EVERYTHING WILL BE FINAL.  FEEDBACK IS GREATLY APPRECIATED

Explore, fight, and live the life of an adventurer as you play and live different stories all with one goal in mind. Staying alive for as long as you can.

Development Discord: https://discord.gg/H5bDvtyDkU

Q: Why is there only 1 story

A: They take long to write

Q: How complete is the game?

A: The games main features (story parser, combat system, save system ,etc) are complete however there are still some bugs and features that I want to add. Also I kinda have to make the stories for the game too and those take a while.

Q: What do you plan on adding?

A: Mostly modding support and a very robust story parsing system. Since the whole game is basically text based its a good idea to get a very robust system in place. Other "features" i would probably add are just UI tweaks/fixes unless someone comes up with a good idea.
